fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Fire a tear at someone, attacking them
-(Familiar) Give the lead a pill, temporarily increasing their luck or range

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you die as the lead at night, don’t and instead have your range increase by 6, damage by one, and luck by 3% permanently, as well as giving you basic defense (ONCE)
-In your familiar form, if you die at night permanently increase the current lead’s range by 5
Damage: 1 (Basic
Range: 4
Luck: -1%
